channel.title: The Daily Star – Opinion
channel.description: Latest opinion pieces from The Daily Star

item.title: What economy are we leaving behind in 2025?
item.description: When the interim government formed following the July 2024 uprising, macroeconomic stability was weak, with several major economic indicators performing poorly.

item.title: What a cashless turn means for our economy
item.description: With mobile banking, QR payments, digital wallets, and instant transfers becoming common, Bangladesh is moving steadily towards a cashless economy.

item.title: How 2025 thinned our cultural space
item.description: If there is one unsettling thread running through Bangladesh's civic space in 2025, it is not confined to uncertain politics, mob outbursts or economic troubles. It runs—often violently—through our cultural scene.
